The three functions created by the statements below are different in important ways. Explain what those differences are.

```{r}
f1 <- makeFun(sin((2*pi/P)*t) ~ t)
f2 <- makeFun(sin((2*pi/6)*t) ~ t)
f3 <- makeFun(sin((2*pi/P)*t) ~ t, P=6)
```
